mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TEAM_APPLICATION WHERE TEAM_NO = #{teamNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEAM_APPLICATION (APPLY_NO, MEMBER_NO, TEAM_NO, APPLY_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_TANO.NEXTVAL, #{ memberNo }, #{ teamNo }, #{ applyContent })
mapper.select: SELECT TA.APPLY_NO applyNo, TA.MEMBER_NO memberNo, TA.TEAM_NO teamNo, TA.APPLY_CONTENT applyContent, TA.APPLY_DATE applyDate, TA.STATUS status, M.NICKNAME nickName, T.TEAM_NAME teamName FROM TEAM_APPLICATION TA JOIN MEMBER M ON TA.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN TEAM T ON TA.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO WHERE TA.TEAM_NO = #{teamNo}
